sqls.sql: select "登録日" as registrationDate , "発生日" as accrualDate , "ステータス" as status , "分類" as classification , "タイトル" as title , cast("金額（元）" as varchar) as amountCNY , cast("金額（円）" as varchar) as amountJPY , cast("為替レート" as varchar) as exchangeRate , "備考" as remarks from "HIS_コスト情報" where "店舗ID" = !shopid order by "登録日" desc
